There were no other sightings in London on or around September 6th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmy sighting occurred on september 6, 2008 at approximately 7:30 pm. est. the sky was clear, the moon was beginning to shine in the southern sky. i walked over to my mother's house next door for a chat and walk. we live on a 14 acre country property just outside of london, ontario. we talked for a few minutes on her outside deck. i remember commenting to her how much sooner the moon was shining in the daylight sky with the days getting shorter. i proceeded to take a walk around our property together with my 14 year old daughter. during our walk, my daughter noticed a couple of "birds" flying just above the moon. she commented how the birds made a face with the moon. i looked up and started to realize the two objects were not birds but something else. as they got closer, they became larger, appearing like missiles. i started to scream to my mother to come out to see these two objects. the objects dipped down and levelled off right above us in the field, no more than a mile up. i continued to scream for my mother as the two ufo's began to slowly move over top of us in a north-east direction. it was truly incredible sight. my mother had come out of her house onto the deck and witnessed these two objects moving over us, and at the same time, a third similar ufo appeared above my mother's house about 100 feet from where we were standing. all these ufo's were massive in size, flying closely together in a staggered formation. the third ufo was slightly higher and slightly ahead of the other two ufo's. i would estimate that each ufo was about 150 feet long. they were shaped like a bullet, bulging slightly in the middle with small fins protruding off the sides. the objects were metallic, with smooth surfaces, dull grey in color, no lights, no markings and no identifiable features except for the small fins. they simply moved slowly north-east, making no sounds whatsoever. there was never any exhaust, no trailing vapor\smoke. i just remember how quiet it all was. we all then witnessed the three ufo's begin to ascend upward in a 50 degree angle in a north-east direction, straight out away from us, becoming smaller and smaller until they disappeared from our view. the ufo's did not fly horizon to horizon, but came from due south,levelling off and then flying north-east, straight up and out beyond our sight. everything happened in about 4 minutes. we could not belive what we had just witnessed, it felt like we were in a movie with special effects. i drew a sketch of what the objects appeared like right after this happened. i called the london airport the next day to ask if any unusual sightings were reported. they told me that there were no air shows going on and nothing unusual on their radar that evening. unfortunately, i did not have a camera with me.
